name: @ambernexus/react
description: AmberNexus branded wrapper for the ElevenLabs React Library

scripts.generate-version: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('src/version.ts', '// This file is auto-generated during build\nexport const PACKAGE_VERSION = \"' + process.env.npm_package_version + '\";\n')"
scripts.build: cross-env BROWSERSLIST_ENV=modern microbundle --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment --jsxImportSource react src/index.ts
scripts.dev: pnpm run clean && pnpm run generate-version && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=development microbundle --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment --jsxImportSource react src/index.ts -w -f modern
scripts.lint: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint:es && pnpm run lint:prettier

author: ElevenLabs
